portfolios.name: O-Present Landing Page
portfolios.desc: Website landing page for O-Present project

portfolios.name: O-Present
portfolios.desc: An open source application for web-based online presence needs, with GPS and selfie photo features.

portfolios.name: PT. Sumber Multi Era Motor Inventory System
portfolios.desc: An inventory management information system website for PT. Sumber Multi Era Motor, featuring allocation, transfer, sales, and return functionalities, designed for seamless integration across all branches.

portfolios.name: KopiKing Company Profile
portfolios.desc: Cafe KopiKing's company profile website is designed to showcase essential information about our cafe. The site includes a comprehensive menu, details about our history and vision, customer testimonials, and a contact page. All content can be easily managed through an intuitive administrator interface.

portfolios.name: FlickSearch
portfolios.desc: A website that facilitates movie searching using the OMDB API as its data source.

portfolios.name: TriCalc
portfolios.desc: A website to help with the process of calculating the area and perimeter of a triangle to fulfill the Mini Coding Project from RevoU.

portfolios.name: TasteTrack
portfolios.desc: A food recipe website utilizing the OMDB API as its data source, featuring recipe ideas and search functionality.
